thread.title: History suggests stock market rout won't lead to bear market

title: History suggests stock market rout won't lead to bear market
text:
History suggests stock market rout won't lead to bear market 3:13am IST - 01:56 
A growing economy is one reason, among many, strategists and historians point to for their belief that last week's stock market correction is less likely to turn into a full-blown bear market.   
A growing economy is one reason, among many, strategists and historians point to for their belief that last week's stock market correction is less likely to turn into a full-blown bear market.  //reut.rs/2su2i1W
